TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataSourceViewSchemaConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 提供表示資料來源結構描述中欄位之屬性的型別轉換子 (Type Converter)。

span.span: Provides a type converter for a property representing a field in a data source schema.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用之前指派的物件類型轉換的控制項屬性的類別。Use the class to convert object types before assignment to a control property. 一般情況下，支援轉換字串物件型別，並提供的標準值指派給相關聯的控制項屬性的清單。In general, the supports converting string object types and supplies a list of standard values available for assignment to the associated control property. 標準值集合是用於目前控制項的資料來源結構描述中的欄位清單。The standard values collection is the list of fields in the data source schema for the current control. 若要支援轉換其他物件的型別，衍生自並覆寫和方法的其他物件類型。To support converting additional object types, derive a class from and override the and methods for the additional object types. 若要支援自訂的標準可指派的值清單，覆寫方法。To support a custom list of standard assignable values, override the method. 套用屬性來指定的控制項屬性的類型轉換器的類別。Apply the attribute to specify the class as the type converter for a control property. 例如，屬性類別和屬性類別使用做為屬性的型別轉換子。For example, the property of the class and the property of the class use the as the property type converter. > [!NOTE] > 您永遠不應該直接存取型別轉換子。You should never access a type converter directly. 請改為使用中呼叫適當的轉換程式物件。Instead, call the appropriate converter by using a object. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的範例。For more information, see the examples in . 方法表示這個轉換子，支援傳回一份可用的值，透過方法。The method indicates that the converter supports returning a list of available values through the method. 方法表示清單是不可能的值的獨占清單。The method indicates that the list is not an exclusive list of possible values.

public: DataSourceViewSchemaConverter();

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 您永遠不應該直接存取型別轉換子。You should never access a type converter directly. 請改為使用中呼叫適當的轉換程式物件。Instead, call the appropriate converter by using a object. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的範例。For more information, see the examples in .

abstract member CanConvertFrom : System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext * Type -> bool override this.CanConvertFrom : System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext * Type -> bool

param.span: 實作，可以用來取得其他內容資訊。

span.span: An implementation that can be used to gain additional context information.
The type to convert from.

summary.span: 指出指定的來源型別是否可以轉換為相關聯控制項屬性的型別。

span.span: Indicates whether the specified source type can be converted to the type of the associated control property.

returns.span: 如果這個轉換器可以執行轉換，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法，以判斷是否方法支援轉換的來源類型。Call the method to determine whether the method supports converting the source type. 方法可以只將字串轉換，所以方法會傳回`true`時`sourceType`是字串。The method can convert only from a string, so the method returns `true` when `sourceType` is a string.

MemberSignature.Value: public override object ConvertFrom (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture, object value);

Public Overrides Function ConvertFrom (context As ITypeDescriptorContext, culture As CultureInfo, value As Object) As Object

abstract member ConvertFrom : System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext * System.Globalization.CultureInfo * obj -> obj override this.ConvertFrom : System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext * System.Globalization.CultureInfo * obj -> obj

param.name: context
param.span: 實作，可以用來取得其他內容資訊。

param.span: 物件，可用於支援當地語系化功能。

The object to convert.

summary.span: 將指定物件轉換成關聯控制項屬性的型別。

span.span: Converts the specified object to the type of the associated control property.

returns.span: 執行個體，表示轉換的物件。

span.span: An instance that represents the converted object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`value`是字串，則字串表示法`value`傳回。If `value` is a string, then the string representation of `value` is returned. 如果`value`是`null`，空字串 ("") 會傳回。If `value` is `null`, an empty string ("") is returned. 如需所有其他指定的值，擲回例外狀況。For all other specified values, a exception is thrown. 呼叫方法，以判斷是否方法支援轉換的來源類型。Call the method to determine whether the method supports converting the source type.

span.span: The conversion could not be performed.

summary.span: 傳回可指派給控制項屬性之可用數值的清單。

span.span: Returns a list of available values that can be assigned to a control property.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection GetStandardValues (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter/StandardValuesCollection GetStandardValues(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetStandardValues (context As ITypeDescriptorContext) As TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection

abstract member GetStandardValues : System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext -> System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection override this.GetStandardValues : System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext -> System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection

param.name: context
param.span: 實作，可以用來取得其他內容資訊。

span.span: An implementation that can be used to gain additional context information.

summary.span: 傳回可指派給關聯控制項屬性之可用數值的清單。

span.span: Returns a list of available values that can be assigned to the associated control property.

returns.span: ，包含可指派給關聯控制項屬性的可用值。

span.span: A containing available values for assignment to the associated control property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會使用屬性指定的`context`物件取得實作。The method uses the property of the specified `context` object to obtain an implementation. 如果實作使用，它用來存取資料來源結構描述，讓關聯控制項設計階段並擷取相關聯的資料來源結構描述檢視中的可用欄位的清單。If the implementation is available, it is used to access the data source schema for the associated control at design time and retrieve the list of available fields from the associated data source schema view. 可用值的集合是從關聯控制項的資料來源結構描述中的欄位所建立。The collection of available values is built from the fields in the data source schema for the associated control.

summary.span: 指出這個轉換子是否傳回包含所有可能數值的清單，而該數值可以指派給關聯控制項屬性。

span.span: Indicates whether this converter returns a list containing all possible values that can be assigned to the associated control property.

returns.span: 如果這個轉換子傳回包含所有可能數值的清單，而這些數值可以指派給關聯控制項屬性，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if this converter returns a list containing all possible values that can be assigned to the associated control property; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法傳回`false`，傳回的清單，表示方法不是所有可能的指派值的獨占清單。The method for a returns `false`, indicating that the list returned by the method is not an exclusive list of all possible assignable values.

param.name: context
param.span: 實作，可以用來取得其他內容資訊。

span.span: An implementation that can be used to gain additional context information.

summary.span: 指出這個轉換子是否傳回一組可用值，以指派給指定內容內的控制項屬性。

span.span: Indicates whether this converter returns a set of available values for assignment to a control property within the specified context.

returns.span: 如果這個轉換子傳回一組標準可用值，以指派給關聯的控制項屬性則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if this converter returns a standard set of available values for assignment to the associated control property; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法表示這個轉換子是否支援傳回一份可用的值，透過方法。The method indicates whether the converter supports returning a list of available values through the method. 方法物件會傳回`true`如果指定`context`物件提供中的實作其屬性。The method for the object returns `true` if the specified `context` object supplies an implementation in its property. 方法會使用實作，以擷取相關聯的資料來源結構描述中的可用欄位的清單。The method uses the implementation to retrieve the list of available fields from the associated data source schema.
